title: Cinderella After Midnight: A sweet, romantic holiday read
description: Three months of luxury, at an exclusive seaside resort, and all at Aunt Gabrielle's expense! Elaine would indeed have considered herself lucky, had there not been one very, very delicate condition attached to the situation -- a condition on which her whole future depended. She held out no great hopes that she would succeed, but what was to become of her if she did not?
author: Mary Burchell
